plays.text: Goal scored by Jason Arnott assisted by Patrik Elias and Petr Sykora

Penalty to Brian Rafalski 2 minutes for Crosschecking Martin Havlat
Penalty to Marian Hossa 2 minutes for High Sticking Patrik Elias served by Bill Muckalt
Penalty to Patrik Elias 2 minutes for High Sticking Marian Hossa
Penalty to Bill Muckalt 2 minutes for Roughing Martin Brodeur
